casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Calvin CHANDLER 189A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 8, 2019 Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Chandler, Kenneth Calvin.

G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law.

Jennifer T. Harrod, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*214The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 8th of July 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of July 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 1st day of August 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
